OrgName.entry: AGE CONCERN SHEFFIELD SWIMMING & FITNESS CLUB

Desc.entry: Swimming and gym sessions for people aged 60 years and over. Membership entitles users to a discount on swimming and the gym at Ponds Forge International Sports Centre during off-paek hours (7.30am-3.30pm Mon-Fri). Run by Age Concern, a registered charity our yearly membership cards are available at Age Concern Sheffields City Centre Information and Resource Centre. Please contact for more information or call into the Age Concern shop at Castle Square.

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Lift. Changing Places Toilet available in this building.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: All activities are available during off-peak hour Mon-Fri 7.30am-3.30pm, Mon 12noon-2pm, Fri 12noon-1pm (swimming, reserved for Age Concern Sheffield holders ony), please contact Age Concern about acquiring membership
